description: Discover the best hotels in Kiel, Germany. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Germany: Central Old Town Riverside Apartments with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Nestled in the heart of Kiel, the capital of Schleswig-Holstein, this newly established residence features thoughtfully designed apartments and studios, perfect for solo travellers or couples. Each apartment features a well-equipped kitchen so guests can customise their living space while enjoying all the comforts of home. Adagio Aparthotel Access Kiel boasts a prime location just a 10-minute walk from the Central Station and only three minutes from the Ferry Terminal. Perfectly placed for exploring Kiel’s rich cultural tapestry and the magnificent fjord coastline, it’s your ideal base for city sights and seaside escapes.

seo.title: Hotels in Kiel - Germany Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Find the best hotels in Kiel, Germany with exclusive deals. Book your perfect getaway with up to 60% off.
